problems.name: Community-Acquired Pneumonia
problems.notes: Required hospitalization. Treated with azithromycin and ceftriaxone.

problems.name: Acute Heart Failure Exacerbation
problems.notes: Admitted for volume overload. Responded to IV diuretics. Discharged on increased Lasix dose.

problems.name: Hypoglycemia
problems.notes: Blood glucose 42. Admitted for observation. Insulin regimen adjusted.

problems.name: Urinary Tract Infection
problems.notes: E. coli. Treated with nitrofurantoin x7 days.

problems.name: Gout, Left First MTP
problems.notes: Acute flare treated with colchicine. Started allopurinol for prophylaxis (later discontinued due to CKD).
